io.cettia.asity.action

Class Actions.Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cettia.asity.action.Actions.Options
  • Enclosing interface:
    Actions<T>

    public static class Actions.Options
extends Object
    Options to create an Actions. With the default options, an Action will work like a typical event manager.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Actions.Options() 
      Actions.Options(Actions.Options options) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean memory() 
      Actions.Options memory(boolean memory)
      Keeps track of previous values and will call any action added after the actions has been fired right away with the latest "memorized" values.
      boolean once() 
      Actions.Options once(boolean once)
      Ensures the actions can only be fired once.
      boolean unique() 
      Actions.Options unique(boolean unique)
      Ensures an action can only be added once.

      • once

        public boolean once()

      • once

        public Actions.Options once(boolean once)
        Ensures the actions can only be fired once. The default value is false.

      • memory

        public boolean memory()

      • memory

        public Actions.Options memory(boolean memory)
        Keeps track of previous values and will call any action added after the actions has been fired right away with the latest "memorized" values. The default value is false.

      • unique

        public boolean unique()

      • unique

        public Actions.Options unique(boolean unique)
        Ensures an action can only be added once. The default value is false.
